long_description: Pedro's Folding hex wrench set features a lightweight, super tough handle with an ergonomic shape. It is easy to hold onto and allows easy access to all the wrenches. Includes 7 hex keys: 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5 and 6mm. Built-in tool stop allows the wrenches to be rotated 270deg.
short_description: Pedro's Folding hex wrench set features a lightweight, super tough handle with an ergonomic shape. It is easy to hold onto and allows easy access to all the wrenches.
